description:
D is the protagonist of the movie, he was hired by the father of a young human woman named http://anidb.net/ch15701 [Charlotte] after her abduction by Baron http://anidb.net/ch15700 [Meier Link].
D is a http://anidb.net/t896 [dhampir]; the son of the Vampire King and human woman. He possesses inhuman strength and speed, allowing him to perform feats such as cutting through trees and catching arrows in flight.
He suffers from "heat sickness" when exposed to sunlight for too long, and has a thirst for blood. In his confrontation with http://anidb.net/ch15710 [Carmilla], it is hinted that he has never given in to the latter. D has a "partner" in the form of http://anidb.net/ch25616 [Left Hand], a parasite that is attached to his left hand.
name: D
